question: Which Arab country has  announced establishment of 1st graduate-level, research-based AI university in world?
explanation: UAE announced the establishment of the first graduate-level, research-based AI university  - Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence( MBZUAI) - in the world. The MBZUAI will enable graduate students, businesses and governments to advance the artificial intelligence field. The University is named after Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi and Deputy Supreme Commander of the UAE Armed Forces, who has long advocated for the UAE’s development of human capital through knowledge and scientific thinking to take the nation into the future.
